verses.text: \w So|strong="H1961"\w* call \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w People|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* sisters, Compassion.

\w Accuse|strong="H7760"\w*, \w accuse|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* mother: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* husband. \w Let|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* acts \w of|strong="H1121"\w* infidelity \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* sight, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* lovers \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w between|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* breasts,

else \w I|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* strip her bare, expose her \w as|strong="H5971"\w* she \w was|strong="H5971"\w* \w on|strong="H7355"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* day \w of|strong="H5971"\w* her birth, make her \w like|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* wilderness, let her become \w like|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* parched land, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* let her die \w of|strong="H5971"\w* thirst.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H5493"\w* children \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* pity, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H6440"\w* children \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w adultery|strong="H5005"\w*,

\w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* mother \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w become|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prostitute, she \w who|strong="H3205"\w* conceived \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* behaved shamefully. She \w has|strong="H3117"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* go \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* lovers \w who|strong="H3205"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* bread \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* water, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wool, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* flax, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* drink.”

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w why|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am going \w to|strong="H1121"\w* hedge \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* ways \w with|strong="H1121"\w* thorns, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* build \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wall about \w her|strong="H3588"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H7355"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* paths.

\w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w pursue|strong="H3212"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* lovers, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* overtake \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* seek \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w find|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w In|strong="H3212"\w* time \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* say, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* first husband, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* better \w off|strong="H5414"\w* \w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w She|strong="H3651"\w* herself \w did|strong="H3651"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* know \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H1870"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w who|strong="H4672"\w* gave \w her|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* grain, \w the|strong="H1870"\w* sweet wine, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* oil, \w who|strong="H4672"\w* lavished \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w her|strong="H4672"\w* silver \w and|strong="H1870"\w* gold – \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* used \w in|strong="H4672"\w* worshipping Baal!

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* grain \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* harvest, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* \w sweet|strong="H2896"\w* wine \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w its|strong="H7725"\w* season. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w withdraw|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* wool \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* flax, given \w to|strong="H7725"\w* cover \w her|strong="H4672"\w* nakedness;

\w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* strip \w her|strong="H5414"\w* naked \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* lovers, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* end \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* celebrations, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* yearly \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w new|strong="H8492"\w* moons, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* sabbaths, \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w festivals|strong="H4150"\w*.

\w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w lay|strong="H1540"\w* waste \w her|strong="H1540"\w* vines \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* fig trees, \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* says, “These \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* wages \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* lovers \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w given|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w*.” \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thicket, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* wild animals \w will|strong="H5869"\w* eat \w them|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w In|strong="H2320"\w* \w this|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H7673"\w* punish \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H2282"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Baals, \w in|strong="H2320"\w* \w which|strong="H2282"\w* \w she|strong="H2320"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* offerings \w to|strong="H4150"\w* them, \w and|strong="H4150"\w* decked herself \w with|strong="H4150"\w* earrings \w and|strong="H4150"\w* jewels, \w and|strong="H4150"\w* went after \w her|strong="H3605"\w* lovers, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* forgot \w me|strong="H3605"\w*, – declares \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* am going \w to|strong="H5414"\w* court \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* speak tenderly \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* vineyards, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Achor \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* door \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hope. \w There|strong="H1992"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* respond \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* youth, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt.

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w time|strong="H3820"\w*, declares \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* call \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* husband, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w no|strong="H1696"\w* \w more|strong="H3651"\w* call \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* master.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* remove \w the|strong="H5414"\w* name \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Baals \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* mouth, \w their|strong="H5414"\w* names never \w again|strong="H6030"\w* \w uttered|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* wild \w animals|strong="H1961"\w*, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* birds \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* sky, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* creatures \w that|strong="H3117"\w* crawl \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* earth. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w break|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* bow \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* sword, banish \w battle|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w lie|strong="H1961"\w* \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* safety.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* wife forever, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* wife \w in|strong="H5493"\w* righteousness, \w in|strong="H5493"\w* justice, \w in|strong="H5493"\w* kindness, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* mercy.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w take|strong="H7901"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w wife|strong="H2416"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* faithfulness, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* know \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \nd Lord\nd*.

\w On|strong="H4941"\w* \w that|strong="H5769"\w* day I \w will|strong="H6664"\w* answer – declares \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H2617"\+w*\nd*, I \w will|strong="H6664"\w* answer \w the|strong="H4941"\w* empty skies, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* they \w will|strong="H6664"\w* answer \w the|strong="H4941"\w* dry earth.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* grain, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* new wine \w and|strong="H3068"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H3045"\w* Jezreel,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* plant \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w land|strong="H8064"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* compassion \w to|strong="H3068"\w* No-Compassion, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Not-My-People, “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H1931"\w*,” \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say, “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.”
